title: Covid-19: Japan reopens to tourists - but with strict rules
description: The once-popular Asian destination has some of the world's toughest Covid-19 restrictions.

title: Anna Chonjnicka: Bruising bananas to create elaborate works of art
description: Anna Chonjnicka bruises the skin of bananas to create intricate artworks before eating her creations.

title: Widow of US Capitol riot officer on 'stigma' of his death
description: Nine days after he was assaulted in the 6 January 2021 attack, Jeff Smith died by suicide.

title: PGA Tour bans overshadow LIV's big day as rapid change shakes golf to core
description: The PGA Tour's decision to ban its members who are playing in LIV Golf's first event near London is the latest twist in the saga that is rocking the game of golf.

title: Prince William spotted selling Big Issue in central London
description: The Duke of Cambridge was seen wearing the Big Issue uniform and selling copies of the magazine.

title: Saxon Mullins: The woman changing Australia's rape laws
description: Saxon Mullins sparked a national debate after saying she felt let down after making a rape allegation.

title: Quiz of the week: What put Kate Bush back in the charts?
description: How closely have you been paying attention to what's been going on over the past seven days?

title: Five tips for saving petrol money examined
description: With filling up an average car now costing £100, are drivers doing the right things to save money?

title: Uefa Women's Euro 2022: How to follow on BBC television, radio, online & social media
description: The tournament from 6-31 July will give BBC audiences 24/7 access to all of the action and insight from the event across TV, radio and online.

title: Alexandre Lacazette: Arsenal forward re-signs for Lyon five years after leaving
description: Arsenal forward Alexandre Lacazette re-signs for Lyon on a free transfer - five years after leaving to join the Gunners for a then club record £46.5m.

title: Ms Marvel: Critics praise Disney's 'joyful' first Muslim superhero story
description: Disney+ series Ms Marvel, which stars Iman Vellani, is said to have made "pop culture history".

title: Landlady gives up pub as quarterly energy bills near £30,000
description: Many businesses are grappling with rising costs at a time when consumers are watching their finances.

title: Berlin crash: Attack on capital's streets was ‘cruel rampage’ – Scholz
description: Berlin's mayor says the suspect, who is in police custody, is "severely mentally impaired".

title: England v New Zealand: Captain Ben Stokes bringing back the 'fun'
description: Captain Ben Stokes says he is looking to bring the "fun" back into playing for England.

title: Storm Arwen: Get ready for more storm power cuts, energy firms told
description: Firms were unprepared for last year's Storm Arwen which left over one million without power, says Ofgem.

title: Mohammad Hasnain: Pakistan fast bowler joins Oval Invincibles
description: Pakistan fast bowler Mohammad Hasnain is the top pick in the men's Hundred overseas wildcard draft.

title: Champions League final: Paris police chief sorry for tear gassing Liverpool fans
description: The head of security at the Champions League final admits failings but says his aim was to save lives.

title: Drivers pay £100 to fill tank for first time as petrol prices soar
description: Fuel prices continue to hit new records, increasing the pressure on household budgets.

title: Boris Johnson tries to reset leadership with housing pledges
description: Boris Johnson is expected to suggest benefits should count towards mortgage payments in a relaunch speech.

title: Europe's 'largest ever' land dinosaur found on Isle of Wight
description: University of Southampton palaeontologists identify the remains of a dinosaur measuring 32ft.

title: Ryanair Afrikaans test: Airline stands by South African language quiz
description: Many South Africans are outraged about the test in Afrikaans, because of its links to apartheid.

title: Smoking age of sale should rise by year each year
description: Review suggests year by year increases until no-one is allowed to buy tobacco and cigarettes.

title: Cost of living: Chip shops battered by price of fish
description: With the cost of cod, oil and other ingredients going up, chippies fear customers will stay away.

title: NBA Finals: Boston Celtics take 2-1 lead over Golden State Warriors
description: The Boston Celtics beat the Golden State Warriors 116-100 in game three of the NBA Finals to take a 2-1 lead.

title: Uvalde attack: US House passes gun bill doomed to fail in senate
description: The measures include banning sales of semi-automatic weapons to under-21s, but they look set to be rejected.

title: James Webb Space Telescope hit by tiny meteoroid
description: Nasa says the incident is not expected to limit the mission's overall performance.

title: Phoebe Waller-Bridge says Edinburgh Fringe is entering a new dawn
description: As president of the Edinburgh Fringe, the Fleabag star says it will be more inclusive and accessible.

title: Grenfell Tower: 'It was apocalyptic, like a horrendous film'
description: Five years on, the man who led victim identification describes how the block was "liable to collapse".

title: Oisin Murphy: Champion jockey had blackouts because of alcohol and feared for career
description: Champion jockey Oisin Murphy says he drank so much alcohol he had blackouts and feared it could end his racing career.

title: ‘Abuse, assault, profit’ - children's homes staff speak out
description: Multiple whistleblowers - current and former staff - say children were failed.

title: Climate change: New Zealand's plan to tax cow and sheep burps
description: It would make it the first country to charge farmers for the methane emissions from their animals.

title: The Papers: 'Zero UK growth in 2023' and '£100 to fill a car'
description: Gloomy forecasts for the UK economy next year and new highs for the price of petrol lead the papers.

title: Cost of living: Soaring bills damaging people's health, say medics
description: Experts warn health inequalities will be widened by the surge in the cost of living.

title: Top Gun: Maverick betrays Hollywood's weakness in China
description: Some claim that the Tom Cruise movie is standing up to Beijing, but the reality is more complicated.
